name: Invisibility
description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell. At higher levels, you can target additional creatures.
higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

components.materialDescription: an eyelash encased in gum arabic

effects.description: Target becomes invisible until it attacks or casts a spell; scales to additional targets with higher slots.
